question: The 2018 Nallur Kantha Swamy festival has started in which neighbouring country of India?
explanation: On August 23, the annual festival at Nallur Kandaswamy Kovil  has started in Jaffna, Sri Lanka with the sacred flag hoisting ceremony  and is attracting thousands of Hindu pilgrims from within the country and abroad.  During the 25-day festival, thousands of Tamil Hindu devotees will attend the rituals in worship of Lord Murugan, Valli and Devanai Amman. The colourful festival includes vibrant chariot processions, rhythmic drumming, dancing and acts of self-mortification. The Ther Thiruvila (chariot festival) is the most popular of all events is very colourful.
